title: SOLD: Tinker Pied F42 - one of four - highest graded!
author: atx840

posts.post_title: SOLD: Tinker Pied F42 - one of four - highest graded!
posts.post_content:
One of the rarest Piedmont 42s to find, the last one of the subset T206resource.com confirmed. I am aware of four examples, with this being the highest graded.

[STRIKE]$4750[/STRIKE] or equivalent trade.  SOLD

[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/pl1VsOq.jpg[/IMG]

Chris,

If this does not sell before the National, bring it with you.
